      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static boolean Piece.attackingOwnPiece​(Piece[][] board, java.lang.String oldPos, java.lang.String newPos)
      A boolean method that returns if a piece is attacking its own color.
      static int Piece.blackCheckMate​(Piece[][] board, java.lang.String piecePosition, java.lang.String wkPosition, java.lang.String bkPosition, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> whitePieces, java.lang.Boolean whiteTurn)
      Method that test whether or not the Black King is in Checkmate, it does this by calculating the number of moves that a players piece can make to save its king.

      A method to actually move a players piece.
      boolean Bishop.moveValid​(Piece[][] board, java.lang.String oldPos, java.lang.String newPos, java.lang.Boolean white)
      This method checks to make sure that the move that is being attempted by the user is correct for the current piece.
      boolean King.moveValid​(Piece[][] board, java.lang.String oldPos, java.lang.String newPos, java.lang.Boolean white)
      This is a boolean method and is used to make sure that all of the moves using the king is valid.

      static void Piece.pawnPromotion​(Piece[][] board, Piece currentPiece, java.lang.String nextMove, java.lang.Boolean whiteTurn)
      Method that checks if the pawn has made it to the opposite side thus making it into a new piece.
